name: Mission Demolition (Soren Gerlach)
description:
To play the game initially, press the start button on the main menu to load the first level. Next, click in the middle of the "Y" of the slingshot, and the projectile will appear, hold the left mouse button, drag the projectile back and away at your ideal launch point and let it go to launch it. The goal of each of the four levels is to hit the goal, which is the green glowing cube in the center of each castle, with a projectile. Press escape if you want to return to the main menu early.

I did not create the clouds for this project; I got them from: http://book.prototools.net/clouds.unitypackage.

By Soren Gerlach with help from Professor Bond.
